title: Buddy Nielsen from Senses Fail
itunes:title: Buddy Nielsen from Senses Fail
description:
Episode 292 - Three times you say? My friend Buddy Nielsen from Senses Fail comes on the show to chat about his new record called “If There Is Light, It Will Find You” coming out soon on Pure Noise Records as well as his new life in Arizona and being a father. We get deep on mortality, the impact of art and more. Like all conversations with Buddy, they are deep and insightful. Dive in and enjoy! Get 15% off by using the code PC100WORDSORLESS. Visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! The ONLY website you need to look at for booking vacation rentals is Tripping.com.The best suitcase you will EVER own. Our friends at Away want to give you $20 off your purchase. Try it for 100 days and if you don’t like it, they will give you a full refund.Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
